Comments: Both configurations create an OSPFv3 instance with process ID 1.
Both configurations set the router ID for the OSPFv3 instance to 1.1.1.1.
Both configurations create an OSPFv3 area with ID 0.0.0.1.

Huawei:
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
undo shutdown
ipv6 enable
ipv6 address 2001:db8:2::2/64
Comments: Both configurations enable the interface, configure IPv6, and assign the IPv6 address 2001:db8:2::2/64.

Huawei:
interface GigabitEthernet3/0/0
undo shutdown
ipv6 enable
ipv6 address 2001:db8:4::1/64
Comments: Both configurations enable the interface, configure IPv6, and assign the IPv6 address 2001:db8:4::1/64.

Huawei:
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.1
interface GigabitEthernet3/0/0
ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.1
Comments: Both configurations assign the interfaces to OSPFv3 area 0.0.0.1.
